name: tar-stream

0.1.0.name: tar-stream
0.1.0.description: tar-stream is an alternative tar parser. It is streams2, does not have a fstream dependency and does not do any file io.

0.1.1.name: tar-stream
0.1.1.description: tar-stream is a streaming tar parser and generator and nothing else. It is streams2 and operates purely using streams which means easily you can extract/parse tarballs without ever hitting the file system.
